info.title: CSS Editor
info.description: This is a simple html editor with a preview and a css code part.

const.name: CSS_PROPERTIES
const.description: Place where the css properties info reside

prop.name: cssName
prop.description: Name of the css editing area

prop.name: htmlName
prop.description: Name of the html editing area

prop.name: structure
prop.description: Structure of the html model on which the css will be projected

prop.name: cssCode
prop.description: CSS code to load on initializing

prop.name: formFactory
prop.description: The formFactory object for building all the form items.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Constructor Method. Constructs and initializes a cssEditor.

parameter.name: $cssName
parameter.description: Name of the css editing area

parameter.name: $htmlName
parameter.description: Name of the html editing area

method.name: setStructure
method.description: Sets the structure of the model of HTML to work with

parameter.name: $structure
parameter.description: Structure of the html model on which the css will be projected

parameter.name: $htmlName
parameter.description: The html code name for posting data.

method.name: setCss
method.description: Set the css code to work with

parameter.name: $cssCode
parameter.description: CSS code to load on initializing

method.name: getCssProperties
method.description: Acquire CSS properties info as an XML document string

parameter.name: $browser
parameter.description: Name of the browser. Can be "w3c", "webkit", "firefox", "iexplorer", "opera"

method.name: build
method.description: Builds and retrns the cssEditor object

parameter.name: $structure
parameter.description: Structure of the html model on which the css will be projected

parameter.name: $css
parameter.description: CSS code to load on initializing

method.name: getTilePage
method.description: Creates and returns a page tile for the cssEditor. It represents a grouping of css properties.

parameter.name: $tile
parameter.description: Info for a specific grouping

parameter.name: $measurement
parameter.description: Info relative to css measurement units

method.name: getSelectProperty
method.description: Creates, initializes, and returns a select DOM element.

parameter.name: $values
parameter.description: CSS property's available values

parameter.name: $firstEmpty
parameter.description: If set to TRUE first value should be empty

parameter.name: $cssName
parameter.description: Name of the css property

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: Type of the property. This can be "input", "select", "length", "time", "angle", "mixed".

parameter.name: $browserSupport
parameter.description: A JSON string that holds a css property's browser support.

parameter.name: $placeholder
parameter.description: Placeholder of the css property value

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: Title of the css property value

method.name: getInputProperty
method.description: Creates, initializes, and returns an input DOM element.

parameter.name: $value
parameter.description: CSS property's value

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: Type of the property. This can be "input", "select", "length", "time", "angle", "mixed".

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: Name of the CSS property.

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: Title of the CSS property

parameter.name: $browserSupport
parameter.description: A JSON string that holds a css property's browser support.
